entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 16.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tetsa River 3:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 16.9°C
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Local smoke becoming hazy near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Hazy in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
